name: Debt Dump
description:
Plot

The value of the U.S. dollar has become negative. The government has switched from physical currency to physical debt. To tax citizens, the U.S. now simply sends them a bunch of physical debt dollars. Instead of illegally taking people's money, criminals now illegally give people money. You play as a criminal throwing debt dollars at people while trying not to get caught.

How To Play
Use the WASD keys to walk and left click to throw debt. Avoid throwing debt into the white circles around police officers. Throw all of your debt at other citizens to advance to the next level.
